post:
Shared Web Hosting Available in 5 Regions

Inventive Hosting have been providing fast and reliable hosting services since 2004.

15 Years in the web hosting industry
SSD Drives in RAID 10 as standard
CloudLinux Operating System
LiteSpeed Enterprise Web Server with Lscache
MariaDB & PostgreSQL Databases
Daily & Weekly Backups kept for 31 days (Jet Backup)
Free cPanel account migration (We will migrate your cPanel Accounts, free of charge!)
30 Day Money Back Guarantee
FREE SSL Certificates (Let’s Encrypt)
PHP Version Selector

Choice of Locations:

USA (West Coast -Los Angeles & Dallas, Texas)
UK (London)
Netherlands (Rotterdam)
Singapore


=========
Our Support
=========

24/7/365 Support
Email & Ticket Support
English speaking support team


=======
Reviews
=======

See our latest reviews on our facebook page - https://www.facebook.com/pg/inventive.hosting/reviews

=========
Data Centres
=========

Our USA based servers are located at the Equinix LA1 data centre in downtown Los Angeles which has with great connectivity throughout North America and Asia. Our Dallas based servers are located at QuadraNet in Dallas Texas.

Our UK based servers are located at the Custodian Data Centre in Maidstone, Kent, England.

Our Netherlands based Servers are located at the Smartdc Data Centre in Rotterdam.

Our Singapore based Servers are located at the OVH data centre.

**** 25% off your for your first year using the following code “HD20" **** (enter at checkout)

=============
Payment Methods
=============

We accept all major Credit/Debit Cards, PayPal and Bank Transfer.

All hosting accounts purchased have a no questions asked 30 day money back guarantee, so if you purchase any service and are not totally happy with it you can get a full no questions asked refund.

All accounts come with the following Developer Tools

Git
Perl
PostgreSQL
Python
Ruby on Rails
NodeJS

All accounts come with:

Softaculous Auto Installer included as standard with our shared hosting accounts

=========
Softaculous
=========

With Softaculous all cPanel users can install scripts and software without having to upload files. You no longer need to create databases or go through the installation process of the most popular blog, forum, portal/CMS, image galleries, wiki, and e-commerce software titles. Script Library with one click installs for 100's of scripts including :


WordPress
AbanteCart
PrestaShop
Joomla
phpBB
SMF
MyBB
Dolphin
Open Real Estate
YetiForce
CubeCart
OpenCart
osCommerce


Click here for more information and to sign up.
